authorCredential.translatedString: I engage in everyday life nearly every day, these days
authorCredential.description: I engage in everyday life nearly every day, these days

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What do lawyers think of systemic racism?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "I\u2019m against it.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The more that the system delivers justice to all, the more opportunities for lawyers.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Systemic racism artificially depresses the wealth opportunities for minorities. The more wealth for minorities, the more opportunities for lawyers.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "It\u2019s inconsistent with some old-fashioned ideas I was taught about \u201cliberty and justice for all.\u201d It certainly strikes me that if I want liberty and justice for myself, it should be afforded to others.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I have seen the effects of systemic injustice. It harms its victims and its perpetrators. It\u2019s a lose-lose proposition.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "There\u2019s this thing called the equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment. It\u2019s a cool idea. We should totally do that.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "In fact, I\u2019ll stick my neck out a bit and say that I\u2019m ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "really", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": " against systemic racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
